content: Enabling the AI tools service will grant all {{productName}} users access to AI-powered features, provided the wallet has sufficient funds. Are you sure you want to continue?

comment.text: This key displays a confirmation dialog asking users if they want to enable the AI tools service for all users of the {{productName}}, requiring sufficient wallet funds. It appears within the Portal Settings page, specifically in the Services section, and serves as a final confirmation step before activating the AI tools.
